description:
The job title is Frontend Engineer Intern, and the description is as follows: 

This is an unpaid, evaluative 3-month internship at Token Metrics for a Frontend Engineer. The intern will work with a team to ensure web design, user experience, and brand consistency are met. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.. The skills required for the job are ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
